source.Select: SELECT EMPLID,DESCR_AC BANK,ACCOUNT,NAME ACCOUNTNAME,TO_CHAR(EFFDT,'yyyymmdd') EFFDT FROM PS_Z_WZS_BANK_VW WHERE ACCOUNT IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(TRIM(ACCOUNT)) > 0
source.Update: UPDATE CASH_ACCOUNT_PS SET ACCOUNT=:ACCOUNT, ACCOUNTNAME=:ACCOUNTNAME, EFFDT = TO_DATE(:EFFDT,'yyyymmdd'),ISDELETED=false WHERE EMPLID=:EMPLID AND ACCOUNT=:ACCOUNT
source.Check: SELECT EMPLID FROM CASH_ACCOUNT_PS WHERE EMPLID=:EMPLID AND ACCOUNT=:ACCOUNT
